rukus.text: We gave the Book to Moses and assigned to him his brother Aaron as a helper
We sent them to those who had denied Our signs, and utterly destroyed them
And Noah‘s people: when they denied the emissaries, We drowned them and made of them an example to mankind; for the wrongdoers We prepared a woeful scourge
And ‘Ād and Thamūd, and those who dwelt at Al-Rass, and many generations in between
to each of them We gave examples, and each of them We exterminated
They must surely have passed by the city which was destroyed by the fatal rain: have they never seen its ruins? Yet have they no faith in the Resurrection
Whenever they see you they only deride you, saying: ‘Is this the man God has sent as an emissary
Had we not stood firm, he would have made us stray from our gods.‘ But when they face the scourge they shall realize who has strayed farther from the right path
Have you considered him who has made a god of his own appetite? Would you be a guardian over him
Or do you think most of them can hear or understand? They are but like cattle; indeed, even more misguided
